DataElement.preferredName: OARS Multidimensional Functional Assessment IADL Questionnaire Handle Your Money Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's response to a question about their ability to handle their own money.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: OARS Multidimensional Functional Assessment IADL Questionnaire Handle Your Money
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire that seeks information both on a person's level of functioning and on their need and utilization of services._A section of the Older Americans Resource Scale Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire (OMFAQ) that seeks information about a person's functional ability to conduct the complex activities of daily living that allow for independent living within a community._A question about whether an individual is able to handle their money.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire that seeks information both on a person's level of functioning and on their need and utilization of services.

Property.preferredName: Instrumental Activities of Daily Living Handle Your Money

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: are you completely unable to handle money?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: are you completely unable to handle money?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is completely unable to do something.: A question about whether an individual is able to handle their money.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is completely unable to do something.
A question about whether an individual is able to handle their money.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: with some help (manage day-to-day buying but need help with managing your checkbook and paying your bills)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: with some help (manage day-to-day buying but need help with managing your checkbook and paying your bills)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is able to do something only with assistance.: A question about whether an individual is able to handle their money.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is able to do something only with assistance.
A question about whether an individual is able to handle their money.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: without help (write checks, pay bills, etc.)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: without help (write checks, pay bills, etc.)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is able to do something without assistance.: A question about whether an individual is able to handle their money.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is able to do something without assistance.
A question about whether an individual is able to handle their money.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that no answer was given.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that no answer was given.
